entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Lawrence
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Lawrence 12:30 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C
Wind: SSW 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High plus 4 except plus 1 north of Terrenceville.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this afternoon except periods of snow north of Terrenceville. Amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 4 except plus 1 north of Terrenceville. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy except periods of snow north of Terrenceville early this evening. Fog patches. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 60 gusting to 80 near midnight then south 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Windy. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023
